name: All User Login Status
author: Ravi Singh

sections.description:
This plugin will help you to find the number of online users. Also help you to check status of users from users menu and check online and last seen of users.

A few notes about the sections above:
Tags: user-status, active-user, user-lastseen, online-user-track
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload all-user-login-status to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php do_action('plugin_name_hook'); ?> in your templates
sections.faq:
Installation?

Standard WordPress Plugin installation

How to use?

Nothing to do, just install and try to upload svg and it will works.
